verses.roman:
mathurā pāṭhāilā tāṅre diyā bhakti-bala
sannyāsīre kṛpā kari' gelā nīlācala

synonyms: mathurā—to Mathurā; pāṭhāilā—sent; tāṅre—him; diyā—giving; bhakti-bala—the strength of devotion; sannyāsīre—unto the Māyāvādī sannyāsīs; kṛpā—mercy; kari'-giving; gelā—went back; nīlācala—to Jagannātha Purī.
translation: After fully instructing Sanātana Gosvāmī, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu sent him to Mathurā with empowered devotional service. In Benares He also bestowed His mercy upon the Māyāvādī sannyāsīs. He then returned to Nīlācala [Jagannātha Purī].
